trans-unit.source: Enumerates types of speech synthesis events.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os tipos de eventos de síntese de fala.

trans-unit.source: Custom speech synthesis engines define the types of events submitted to the Speech platform synthesizer infrastructure with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: Mecanismos de síntese de fala personalizado definem os tipos de eventos enviados para a infraestrutura da plataforma de fala sintetizador com o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: Specification is performed by setting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instances passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the class implementing the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a custom speech engine's implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: Especificação é efetuada, definindo a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instâncias passadas para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> membro do classe que implementa o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface passada para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> método na implementação do mecanismo de fala personalizado <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.

trans-unit.source: The Speech platform infrastructure indicates the type of events it is currently handling through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> passed to the speak implementation.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura da plataforma de fala indica o tipo de eventos que trata-se no momento por meio de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> passado para a implementação de fala.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> is a bitmask, where the members of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> define the location of the bit corresponding to the event type.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> é um bitmask, onde os membros de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> definem o local do bit correspondente ao tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: For example, WordBoundary has a value of five (5), meaning the fifth bit in the value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> indicates if the site supports the event type.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, WordBoundary tem um valor de cinco (5), que significa que o quinto bit no valor retornado por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> indica se o site oferece suporte ao tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de uma implementação de síntese de fala personalizado herdando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e use-o de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias e cria uma nova matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias a serem passados para o `Speak` método em um mecanismo de síntese subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por encontrado valor de enumeração do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> instância é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>, a implementação

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Converte Americanism para Britishisms no texto a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfaces provided to the implementation support the WordBoundary event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfaces fornecidas para a implementação de suportam para o tipo de evento WordBoundary, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instância é usada para criar um evento para a unidade de um medidor de progresso do sintetizador é criado.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de processamento de fala é chamado com a modificação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes an audio level change while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando um mecanismo sintetizador de fala conclui uma alteração do nível de áudio durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a bookmark while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando um mecanismo sintetizador de fala encontra um indicador durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters the end of its input stream while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando um mecanismo sintetizador de fala encontra o final do fluxo de entrada durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a phoneme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando um mecanismo sintetizador de fala conclui um fonema durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a sentence while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando um mecanismo sintetizador de fala conclui uma frase durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine a begins speaking a stream.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando um mecanismo sintetizador de fala começa a falar um fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a viseme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando um mecanismo sintetizador de fala conclui um visema durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a change of Voice while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando um mecanismo sintetizador de fala encontra uma alteração de voz durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a word while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando um mecanismo sintetizador de fala conclui uma palavra durante a fala.
